ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm good question ;)  I haven t tried that. **may have just found a new way to entertain herself when the puller is being lazy** Lyrnia Jongleur Bard of
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm good question ;) I haven't tried that.

**may have just found a new way to entertain herself when the puller is
being lazy**

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2

From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2000 11:05 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!


> can't you dispel group members?
>
> Shada
